author: Thiago Nunes
title: LCC in Brazil for Growth and Adopt.
description: Lack of optimization in community communication during Cardano Growth Phase, we need more content translation and core members are overload.

assessments.note: It's a simple proposal for a huge market. This needs to happen in some shape or form.

The proposal has the clear goal of strengthening the LCC in Brazil, which is in line with the challenge. The budget might not be enough to pay for the video editing, but it is reasonable depending on the amount of content created and/or translated.
The team behind this proposal are trusted Cardano Ambassadors and the proposal is well scoped including a budget breakdown for costs.

This proposal addresses the challenge. Despite African countries is the most wished place to have a successful deployment of cardano blockchain network there are other places where this would have a significant impact in people lives like Venezuela, so it would be great to add spanish language to reach south american countries with severe inflation.

There is a big market for Cardano in Brazil.
As most of the population doesn't speak a second language, let alone English, translations of information is critical to inform and eventually integrate this market.

To improve this proposal, aim to integrate once the LCC is established.
You could also expand to Spanish and create a Latin hub.
The proposal describes a reasonable problem and solution, the idea has the potential to increase Cardano's reach in Portuguese-speaking communities and the LCC idea addresses the challenge.
Not 100% sure if hiring 1-3 people is the way to go or if there is a better way but I think we should give it a try.

Based on the previous experience, the goal is completely achievable, although some team members or not yet onboard. Also, the plan to make the operation sustainable after the fund ends is very good. Might be good to talk to the team working on the Community-Driven Content Production proposal, it seems that there are some synergies.
this proposal includes key metrics, a budget breakdown and a detailed plan for implementation.

There is a demand for this is in South-America. The proposer's experience is relevant to the task.
Make use of the tags to find the right people to aid you.

Characteristics like Cardano Ambassador, stake pool operator and experience in the field are a bonus to get a successful result. The proposal could be improved with a set of achievements, goals and deadlines in order for the voters to have a better perspective.

The presented plan is simple, but due to the low complexity of the proposal, it is sufficient to indicate that the proposal should be implemented without difficulties. The proposer described relevant experiences to the proposal, however I recommend including  Linkedin so that the community can evaluate and attest to his qualifications.

I would like to see some more numerical goals and KPIs presented.

Thiago, you are, probably the best person to judge the associated risks and viable alternatives. Please elaborate and share more detailed plans.

Plan and roadmap are relatively well described. KPIs are also described, but some numbers and metrics would increase the proposal value and accountability. Limitations based on the proposed budget are pointed out, which is good.

I feel the proposal lacks the means to reach this content to the communities. What kind of partnerships would be made and platforms will be used (like twitter, youtube, or other more effective in those countries)
There are still a few question marks. Where will this LCC be located? Will it eventually hit the streets to promote Cardano or remain digital only?
The plan describes details about budget allocation, details about the proposer and metrics for success assessment. The proposal addresses the challenge in a relevant way.

solution: We want to hire more content translators, designers and maybe video editors. We need to strength our presence in Brazil and Lusitans.
experience: IT background, entrepreneur and relevant experience in Marketing and Digital Strategies segment. Currently Cardano Ambassador Lvl. 3 and SPO
